GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
cpufreq: Init completion before kobject_init_and_add()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit e379b88a8f8cffc99b318e028705ed9e3da0e1e0, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 4ebe36c94aed95de71a8ce6a6762226d31c938ee. For more details please see the references link.
